subjects.name: Operating System
subjects.description: Learn about OS concepts, processes, memory management, and file systems with comprehensive study materials.

subjects.name: Computer Network
subjects.description: Master networking protocols, TCP/IP, and network security with practical examples and theory.

subjects.name: Database Management
subjects.description: Understand SQL, NoSQL, database design, and optimization techniques for modern applications.

subjects.name: Data Structures
subjects.description: Learn arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and algorithms with implementation examples.

subjects.name: Software Engineering
subjects.description: Software development lifecycle, design patterns, testing methodologies, and project management.

subjects.name: Machine Learning
subjects.description: AI fundamentals, algorithms, neural networks, and deep learning concepts with practical projects.
